channel.title: Game Sounds
channel.description: Hey so I'm looking for the game sounds for RuneScape from 2004 - 2006ish if anyone knows where I could find those. I'm not sure if this should be under server or client though. Yeah so anyways a link to a page would be pretty helpful thank you. I already have the music downloaded so I won't need that just the sounds.

item.title: Game Sounds
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

I’m not sure if you can find 2004-06… But I’ve found the OSRS 07 one.

Old School RuneScape Wiki

Music

Music in Old School RuneScape is mostly in-game background music designed to enhance a player's gaming experience and fit with the environment the avatar is in. Music in Old School RuneScape draws inspiration from progressive rock, with elements of...

And this website would have the newer ones… http://www.runescape.com/downloads_music.ws

Read full topic
